reviews.review: L4D wrote the book on cooperative multiplayer: roughly hour-long, story-driven campaigns, procedural enemy and item spawns with dynamic difficulty modulation for optimal replay value. It's also all contextualized with the perfect execution we've come to expect from Valve, and exhibits shocking gameplay variety considering the endless zombie hordes.

Left 4 Dead is the game that started many new Zombie games, including its sequel. It provides an unmatched player-cooperative experience, and the Versus mode is even more fun.

The atmosphere is believable, somewhat creepy, but absolutely “slick”.

If you have (exactly 3 willing) friends, then this will be your go-to game, hands-down.

get it

This a a very fun game with friends which was released 6 years ago and it never gets old. Too bad Valve ported the original Left 4 Dead campaigns to the second game, but that shouldnt stop anyone from buying this game! If you want the real  experience, please do buy this game, there are  different types of game modes such as Campaign, Versus and Survival. It's an awesome team game which never gets boring and it is always a different experience every time you play it.

So if you're a fan of zombie apocalypse games, then this game is for you.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Впрочем, несмотря на увлекательный геймплей, она была не идеальна: карт не хватало, многие элементы требовали шлифовки. Увы, Valve Software выпускала крупные обновления для L4DКраткая информация об игре не так охотно, как к Team Fortress 2. 8.5/10

An absolute classic, few games are as simplistic in their approach and yet so brutally complex in its difficulties. I logged over 225 hours in this game before Left 4 Dead 2 came out and stole my interest.

Really fun

[h1]Played it on release and I miss what it used to be, there used to be an infinite melee, but the developers saw people together in corners constantly melee'ing everything they decided to watch people play and fix every fun exploit they could find. There's still lots I continue to do because they quit and moved onto Left 4 Dead 2 (currently working on Evolve now though) but overall I believe it's the best zombie killing game out there. Best to play with friends and even meet new people.
Lots of fun!

9/10[/h1]

I loved this game when I first saw it, and when I got to play it for the first time, I honestly couldn't put it down. It's best played with friends, as the game focuses a lot on teamwork.

Though with coop, there will naturally be pvp, or just friends being an a** for the fun of it, but even so it makes it even more "interesting".

The game looks good, has a decent difficulty and is a fun to play game. I definitely recommend it to you zombie fans out there!

Here are my Apple 15" PowerBook Pro system specs:  Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, 4 MB system RAM, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT with 256MB dedicated video RAM, running OS X version 10.6.8 (10K549), HSF+ Extended file system.

Este juego es muy bueno, sin embargo actualmente ya no hay razones para comprarlo puesto que L4D2 posee todo lo que este tiene.

Por otra parte hay algunas cosas que prefiero del L4D1, como que usa menos recursos de la PC, ademas de que el juego en si se siente mas completo, puesto que uno entra a jugar y va y elige la primera misión, y asi va de una en una jugando cada mapa de acuerdo al orden de la historia, esto en la secuela aun no lo he podido hacer, es mas enredado. Ademas de que lo siento mas balanceado, y que el juego captura mejor el sentimiento de apocalipsis zombie, incluso cuando juego L4D2 suelo buscar los mapas nocturnos del primero, ya que los prefiero sobre los nuevos.

En lo que si se mejoro en la secuela (y por mucho) aparte de la cantidad de armas y de infectados, son las horas de juego continuo necesarias para que uno se aburra de jugarlo (al menos por un tiempo), en el primero en unas 15 horas ya uno se cansa de jugarlo, en L4D2 es un poco mas de tiempo (pero eventualmente pasara también).

Finalmente, yo recomiendo el juego, pero cada vez menos personas lo juegan, esta muriendo lentamente, lo cual es una lastima.

Mi piace molto di più rispetto al secondo capitolo, anche se è pieno di persone che a ogni minima cazzata fanno rage quit, espellono, ecc.

Lo suggerisco a tutti gli amanti sia della casa produttrice Valve sia dei survival horror, avrete molte ore di divertimento assicurato se ci potete giocare anche con qualche amico.

Dal punto di vista tecnico è carino e giocabile, usa sempre il source che nonostante adesso abbia i suoi anni, dal punto di vista qualitativo non pecca (molto leggero).

Left 4 Dead was on the halloween sale a while ago, and i had this urge to collect all games that ran on the source engine. I'm very glad i bought this game, as it has been one of the most entertaining games i've ever played. And when you play this with your friends, family, whatever (in my case; my sister), the fun doubles.

The game is made to never be the same every time you play it. Everything is placed out randomly, and new zombies appear out of nowhere, sometimes in hordes. You really need to work together to survive.

I highly recommend this game to everyone who like zombies, like multiplayer games and people who like games where the gameplay always is new and fresh.
